member.name: T:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.BackendDefinitionBehavior
member.summary: Defines the behavior for processing BackendDefinitions when Request Expectations exist

member.name: F:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.BackendDefinitionBehavior.NoExpectations
member.summary: Will not match Backend Definitions if Request Expectations exist

member.name: F:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.BackendDefinitionBehavior.Always
member.summary: Will match Backend Definitions if the next Request Expectation did not match

member.name: T:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.AnyMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to matches any one of {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.BackendDefinitionFallbackHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Backend definitions were still evaluated because the BackendDefinitionBehavior is set to Always. This can be changed by using BackendDefinitionBehavior.NoExpectations.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.BackendDefinitionMatchSuccessHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The following backend definition matched and handled the result:.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.BackendDefinitionsMatchFailedHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} backend definitions were evaluated but did not match:.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.ContentMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to request body matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.CustomMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to request matches a custom predicate.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.FormDataMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to form data exacly matches (no additional keys allowed) {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.HeadersMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to headers match {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.JsonContentMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to JSON request body matches custom {0} predicate.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MatcherStatusFailedLabel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to FAILED.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MatcherStatusSkippedLabel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SKIPPED.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MatcherStatusSuccessLabel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to MATCHED.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MatchFailureHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to match a mocked request for {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MatchSuccessHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Matched a mocked request for {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.MethodMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to method matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.NoBackendDefinitionFallbackHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} backend definitions were not evaluated because the BackendDefinitionBehavior is set to NoExpectations. This can be changed by using BackendDefinitionBehavior.Always.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.PartialContentMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to request body partially matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.PartialFormDataMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to form data matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.PartialQueryStringMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to query string matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.QueryStringMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to query string exacly matches (no additional keys allowed) {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.RequestExpectationMatchFailureHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The next request expectation failed to match:.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.RequestExpectationMatchSuccessHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The next request expectation matched and handled the result:.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.SkippedRequestExpectationsHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} additional request expectations were not evaluated because request expectations (Expect) must be matched in order. For unordered matches, use backend definitions (When)..

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.UrlMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to URL matches {0}.

member.name: P:RichardSzalay.MockHttp.Formatters.Resources.XmlContentMatcherDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to XML request body matches custom {0} predicate.
